name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Dongguan, Guangdong, Fenggang Town was exposed for withholding wages for sanitation workers. The workers went on strike, leaving the streets unattended and a large amount of garbage scattered next to the trash cans.
A video showed workers gathering at the Fenggang Town Government to defend their rights. The video poster said that they had not been paid for two months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shanghai, netizens used cameras to record the Shanghai South Railway Station in the early hours of the morning. Some people slept on the floor outside the railway station to save on accommodation costs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, two students from the No. 1 Middle School in Huangzhong District, Xining City, Qinghai Province, died of Neisseria meningitidis.
On July 4, the Xining government announced that all teachers and students in the class were suspended from classes, and were not allowed to go out or gather unless necessary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Shandong. A "Ding Yizhen-style window" appeared at the Pingdu Citizen Service Center, requiring residents to kneel or bend over to consult.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 3, a segment in the TV series "The Police Chief" in which the household registration window refused to issue temporary residence permits to outsiders and the new chief solved the problem domineeringly was ridiculed by many netizens. Netizens called it a "sci-fi film"
